sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import '../styles/tour-details.css'; import { Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup} from 'reactstrap' import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../assets/data/tours'; import calculateAvgRating from './../utils/avgRating'; const TourDetails = () => { const {id} =useParams(); // this is an static data that later we will call our API and load our data from database const tour =tourData.find(tour=> tour.id === id); //destructure properties from tour object const {photo, title, desc, price,address, reviews, city, distance, maxGroupSize} =tour; const{totalRating, avgRating} =calculateAvgRating(reviews); return<>

{title}

{avgRating === 0 ? null :avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? ("Not rated") : ( ({reviews ?.length}))} {address}
{city} {price} / per person {maxGroupSize}
Description

{desc}

{/* ====================================tour reviews section ===========================*/}

Reviews({reviews ?.length}reviews)

{/* ====================================tour reviews section end ===========================*/}
}; export default TourDetails;
